full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,BCOM LDAN 'DAS SMAN PA'I RGYAL PO'I DKYIL 'KHOR BSGRUB MCHOD KYI CHO GA YONGS RDZOGS GZHAN PHAN YONGS 'DU'I DBANG PO ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @098A *, ,CES BCOM LDAN 'DAS SMAN PA'I RGYAL PO LHA LNGA BCU RTZA GCIG PA'I DKYIL 'KHOR GYI CHO GA GZHAN PHAN YONGS 'DU'I DBANG PO ZHES BYA BA 'DI'I SMON LAM DANG SHIS BRJOD MA GTOGS BLA BRGYUD DANG DKYIL 'KHOR GYI CHO GA SOGS RJE BDAG NYID CHEN PO'I SNGAGS RIM CHEN MO DANG, ,RDO RJE 'CHANG LHA BTZUN RIN PO CHE'I DKYIL CHOG NOR BU'I PHRENG BA, KHON STON DPAL 'BYOR LHUN GRUB KYI DE BZHIN GSHEGS PA BDUN GYI DKYIL 'KHOR DU DBANG BSKUR @098B BA'I CHOG PHAN BDE'I 'BYUNG GNAS, CHING SU TSIG THU NO MIN HAN GYI DKYIL CHOG GDUNG SEL NOR BU'I 'KHRI SHING SOGS YIG CHA KHUNGS THUB RNAMS NAS KHA BSKANGS TE, ` SH'AKYA'I DGE SLONG KHU RAL MKHAN PO YONGS 'DZIN NO MIN RTA NA DGON GSAR SPRUL MING 'DZIN PA BLO BZANG DPAL LDAN CHOS 'PHEL NAS SBYAR BA'O, ,'DIS KYANG THUB BSTAN SNYING PO 'JAM MGON TZONG KHA PA CHEN PO'I MDO SNGAGS ZUNG 'BREL GYI RING LUGS DRI MA MED PA 'DI NYID PHYOGS DUS GNAS SKABS SU KUN TU DAR ZHING RGYAS LA YUN RING DU GNAS PAR GYUR CIG , ,,BKRA SHIS DPAL 'BAR 'DZAM GLING RGYAN DU BYON,, ,,` PHAN BDE'I 'BYUNG GNAS SMAN DKYIL CHOG GZHAN PHAN, ,YONGS 'DU'I DBANG PO GA-YUR DU ZAB YI, ,THAD MCHOG 'BRAS BU'I DPAL 'BYOR LA 'GRO KUN, ,RTAG TU SPYOD PHYIR CHOS SBYIN RGYUN 'DI SPEL, ,MANGGA LAm, ,)
